actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain records classifying individuals on the basis of ethnicity shall classify as "Filipino" individuals identifiable as being of Filipino origin.

summary.text: Requires that Government recordkeeping requirements which classify individuals by race, ethnicity, or national origin include a separate classification for individuals of Filipino origin.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain records classifying individuals on the basis of ethnicity shall classify as "Filipino" individuals identifiable as being of Filipino origin.
